scripts.test: yarn lint && yarn workspace @nulogy/components build-storybook && yarn cypress run --spec '**/components/**/*spec.js'
scripts.test:with-static-storybook-full: yarn workspace @nulogy/components build-storybook && yarn http-server -p 8080 ../components/storybook-static & HTTPSERVER_PID=$! && yarn wait-on http://localhost:8080 && yarn cypress run --spec '**/components/**/*spec.js'; kill $!
scripts.test:with-static-storybook: yarn workspace @nulogy/components build-storybook && yarn start-static-storybook-server && yarn cypress run --spec '**/components/**/*spec.js' && kill %-
scripts.start-stop-static-storybook-server: http-server -p 8080 ../components/storybook-static & HTTPSERVER_PID=$! && yarn wait-on http://localhost:8080 && kill %-
